Norwegian (Bokmål): redd, but also bange (archaic, mostly used in standard expressions like "bange anelser")
gutt, dreng (archaic or used in a more narrow sense)
Swedish: pojke, dräng (archaic or used in a more narrow sense)
skoj, rolig, kul, lustig, komisk, festlig
flicka, tjej, jänta, piga (archaic or used in a more narrow sense)

Norwegian (Bokmål): sludder, vrøvl, nonsens, tull, tøys, vås
sau, smale (archaic/dialectal), får (archaic/dialectal, used in expressions/ fixed phrases )

Danish: somme tider, iblandt, (colloquial:) nogle gange, af og til, indimellem,
Swedish: ibland, av och till, då och då, emellanåt
